description: Law relating to commercial companies; in particular, legal personality, directors' duties, shareholders' rights, liquidations, takeovers, & comparison with partnership structure.
prerequisites: COMM1201 or 1202 or LAWS1001 or 1100 or 1101
incompatible: COMM3205 or 7202 or LAWS7011 or 5017 or 7117 or 7317
restricted: Not for students enrolled in LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB, LLB (Grad Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs
